resp = client.cluster.put_component_template(
    name="ct1",
    template={
        "settings": {
            "index.number_of_shards": 2
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.cluster.put_component_template(
    name="ct2",
    template={
        "settings": {
            "index.number_of_replicas": 0
        },
        "mappings": {
            "properties": {
                "@timestamp": {
                    "type": "date"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.indices.simulate_template(
    index_patterns=[
        "my*"
    ],
    template={
        "settings": {
            "index.number_of_shards": 3
        }
    },
    composed_of=[
        "ct1",

    ],
)
print(resp2)
